item.title: Having trouble with makin portal work
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Should be like admin/admin admin/ or /admin…
Did you try

case 2466: //portal for mod { if (playerRights >= 1); teleportToX = 3360; teleportToY = 3306; heightLevel = 0; } break;
or

case 2466: //portal for mod if (playerRights >= 1); { teleportToX = 3360; teleportToY = 3306; heightLevel = 0; } break;
?
But those are for mods, admins, and anything higher.

Read full topic

item.title: Having trouble with makin portal work
item.dc:creator: @lostandfound lostandfound
item.description:
@lostandfound wrote:

case 2466: //portal for mod if (playerRights >= 1); teleportToX = 3360; teleportToY = 3306; heightLevel = 0; break;

Replace your old code with this
Then change the coords
teleportToX = 3360;
teleportToY = 3306;
Shown above

Just use this damit

Read full topic
item.source: Having trouble with makin portal work

item.title: Having trouble with makin portal work
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

It should only let mods do it at >= 1.
Try making it

case 2466: // portal for mod { if (playerRights >= 1); teleportToX = X coords; teleportToY = Y coords; } break;
I don’t use portals with playerRight requirements.

Read full topic
